title: Generics in Go 1.18
description: This lab introduces the concept of generics in Golang. Starting from version 1.18, Golang has added support for generics, which allows us to write more flexible and reusable code.

meta.title: Generics in Go 1.18: Unlocking Flexible and Reusable Code
meta.description: Explore the power of generics in Golang 1.18, enabling you to write more versatile and reusable code.
meta.keywords: generics, golang, go, type parameters, constraints
